name: Twitter Promoted Tweet Remover (2022)
description: As it says on the tin - it removes promoted tweets.  It's not particularly sophisticated, and who knows how long it will be till Twitter changes something and it stops working, but hey, it's free.
additional_info: I left a red dotted line in the layout to show you where the Promoted Tweet would have been. Feel free to remove that line from the CSS if you want.
